channel.title: Ecf18 on Eclipse BaSyx
channel.description: Recent content in Ecf18 on Eclipse BaSyx

item.title: EclipseCon France 2018 - Robert Höttger interview
item.description: Interview with Robert Höttger (Fachhochschule Dortmund - University of Applied Science and Arts). Robert presented the recent news about the APPSTACLE project.

item.title: EclipseCon France participation
item.description: EclipseCon France 2018 Eclipse Kuksa was presented at EclipseCon France 2018 along with the research booth, the research community’s pitch session, a regular talk hold by Tobias Rawald and Robert Hoettger, and an interview about the motivation, goals, and the current state of Eclipse Kuksa. We really enjoyed hosting @EclipseCon France these neat research projects and their representatives @Appstacle @agile_iot @AMASSproject @crossminer @gemocinitiative @stamp_project. We are looking forward for meeting at @EclipseCon Europe!
